Rulings.Base:
1. Both effects target.
2. Returning a monster to the Deck and drawing a card do not happen simultaneously. Drawing 1 card is the last thing to occur.
3. You cannot activate the effect to equip a Union monster if "Delta Tri" is already equipped with a Union monster.
4. The effects of a Union monster equipped to "Delta Tri" as a result of its own effect are treated as being equipped by the effect of the Union monster. All the effects granted by the Union monster will apply.
